ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human offspring (son or daughter) of any age; an immediate progeny.

Concepts.definition: A first-generation, biological descendant of any age.

Property.preferredDefinition: Relating to the lungs.:Function; what something is used for.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the lungs as the intended site of administration, where the pharmaceutical product is administered, usually by inhalation, for local action in the lower respiratory tract or for systemic action after absorption via the lower respiratory tract.
The normal action performed by a structure or device.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Spirometry is a common Pulmon
ReferenceDocuments.description: Spirometry is a common Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) measuring the amount (volume) and/or speed (flow) of air being inhaled and exhaled.
